metadata.title: CVE-2021-43559 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Moodle in versions 3.11 to 3.11.3, 3.10 to 3.10.7, 3.9to 3.9.10 and earlier unsupported versions. The "delete related badge"functionality did not include the necessary token check to prevent a CSRFrisk.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
